NK046(mi)001:7683: ras kyi rin gyis ras bal gyi sa bon nyos la de bgo bar gyis shig /
NK046(mi)001:7684: gsum pa de'i lan dgag pa ni /
NK046(mi)001:7685: dngos po la de ltar gnas kyang 'jig rten rmongs
NK046(mi)001:7686: pas sa bon la ras ma mthong bas mi gon
NK046(mi)001:7687: no zhe na / ma yin te /
NK046(mi)001:7688: de nyid shes par 'dod pa'i ser skya sogs kyis
NK046(mi)001:7689: kyang rnam gzhag sa bon mi gon par ras gon
NK046(mi)001:7690: pa de nyid yin pa'i phyir dang /
NK046(mi)001:7691: khyod nyid lugs kyi 'bras bu de nyid shes pa
NK046(mi)001:7692: de rgyu 'jig rten pa la yang yod pa des
NK046(mi)001:7693: sa bon la ras ci ste mthong ba ma yin
NK046(mi)001:7695: 'jig rten pa la'ang yod mod kyi rgyu'i gnas skabs
NK046(mi)001:7696: 'jig rten pa'i blo thams cad tshad ma min pas
NK046(mi)001:7697: mi rtogs par 'dod na ni blo des 'bras bu
NK046(mi)001:7698: nyid gsal bar mthong ba'ang bden pa ma yin par
NK046(mi)001:7699: 'gyur te / blo 'khrul pa'i yul yin pas so //
NK046(mi)001:7700: bzhi pa rang la gnod pa spang ba ni /
NK046(mi)001:7701: gal te dbu ma pa'i lugs la yul 'jal byed
NK046(mi)001:7702: kyi tshad ma rnams kyang tshad ma min te 'khrul
NK046(mi)001:7703: pa yin na des gzhal ba'i stong nyid kyang brdzun
NK046(mi)001:7705: 'gyur ba de'i phyir de nyid du stong pa nyid sgom pa'ang mi 'thad par 'gyur ro zhe na /
NK046(mi)001:7706: blos btags pa'i dngos po la ma reg ste de
NK046(mi)001:7707: yul du ma byas par de'i dngos po med pa
NK046(mi)001:7709: mo gsham gyi bu ma bzung bas de shi ba mi 'dzin pa bzhin no //
NK046(mi)001:7710: dngos med dngos la ltos pa de'i phyir dgag bya
NK046(mi)001:7711: brdzun pa'i dngos po gang yin pa de bkag pa'i
NK046(mi)001:7712: dngos med gsal bar brdzun no //
NK046(mi)001:7713: 'on kyang stong pa nyid sgom pa 'thad de /
NK046(mi)001:7714: bden 'dzin gyi gnyen po byed pa'i phyir te des
NK046(mi)001:7715: na dper na rmi lam du bu shi ba rmi
NK046(mi)001:7716: ba la bu de med snyam pa'i rnam rtog ni
NK046(mi)001:7717: bu de yod par rnam par rtog pa'i gegs yin
NK046(mi)001:7718: la / med 'dzin de yang brdzun pa yin yang yod 'dzin de spong nus pa bzhin no //
NK046(mi)001:7720: de bas na de ltar rigs pas rnam par dpyad
NK046(mi)001:7721: na dngos po 'ga' yang rgyu med yod pa ma
NK046(mi)001:7722: yin la / rgyu rkyen so so ba'am 'dus pa'i
NK046(mi)001:7723: rkyen rnams la dang po nas gnas pa ma yin
NK046(mi)001:7724: yin la / zhing / gzhan nas gsar du 'ongs
NK046(mi)001:7725: ba yang ma yin pas dang por skyes pa ma
NK046(mi)001:7726: yin la / zhing / yin la / des na bar du gnas pa ma yin zhing /
NK046(mi)001:7727: tha mar 'gags nas gzhan du 'gro ba yang ma yin no //
NK046(mi)001:7728: dpyad na ma grub cing rmongs pas bden par bzung
NK046(mi)001:7729: bar byas pa gang yin pa 'di ni snang yang
NK046(mi)001:7730: mi bden pas sgyu ma las ni khyad ci yod
NK046(mi)001:7731: de med do // gnyis pa ni /
NK046(mi)001:7732: sgyu mas sprul pa'i rta glang la sogs pa gang yin pa dang /
NK046(mi)001:7733: rgyu rkyen rnams kyis gang sprul pa'i gzugs la sogs
NK046(mi)001:7734: pa de ni dang po gang nas 'ongs par gyur
NK046(mi)001:7735: cing bar du gnas pa dang mthar gang du 'gro
NK046(mi)001:7737: brtags na 'gro 'ong med par mtshungs te /
NK046(mi)001:7739: gzugs ni gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du'ang mi 'gro gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do //
NK046(mi)001:7740: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs pa bzhin no //
NK046(mi)001:7741: 'bras bu gang zhig gi rgyu gang ni nye ba yis mthong bar 'gyur la /
NK046(mi)001:7742: rgyu de med na mthong ba ma yin pa'i rgyu
NK046(mi)001:7743: rkyen gyi bcos bu yin pas gzugs brnyan dang mtshungs
NK046(mi)001:7744: pa de la bden pa nyid ga la yod de
NK046(mi)001:7746: gang zhig rkyen las skyes pa de ma skyes //
NK046(mi)001:7747: de la skye ba'i rang bzhin yod ma yin //
NK046(mi)001:7748: rkyen la rag las gang de stong pa nyid //
NK046(mi)001:7749: gang gis stong nyid shes de bag yod min //
NK046(mi)001:7751: gnyis pa 'bras phyogs nas stong par sgrub pa la gsum ste /
NK046(mi)001:7752: mtha' gnyis kyi skye ba dgag pa dang /
NK046(mi)001:7754: des na stong par sgrub pa'o //
NK046(mi)001:7756: dang po yod pa skye ba dgag pa ni /
NK046(mi)001:7757: dngos po yod par gyur pa la rgyu yis dgos pa ci zhig yod de /
NK046(mi)001:7759: gnyis pa med pa skye ba dgag pa la gnyis las /
NK046(mi)001:7760: dang po med pa nyid bskyed bya ma yin pa ni /
NK046(mi)001:7761: 'on te de ni med na yang rgyu yis dgos pa ci zhig yod de /
NK046(mi)001:7762: de 'bras bu ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
NK046(mi)001:7763: gnyis pa de dngos por bsgyur du mi rung ba ni /
NK046(mi)001:7764: rgyus dngos med du mi skyed kyang des dngos por sgyur bar byed do zhe na /
NK046(mi)001:7766: bye ba phrag brgya rgyu yis kyang dngos po med pa de gzhan du bsgyur du med de /
NK046(mi)001:7768: gal te 'gyur na dngos med dang ma bral ba'am bral nas 'gyur /
NK046(mi)001:7769: dang po ltar na dngos med dang ma bral ba'i
NK046(mi)001:7770: gnas skabs de dngos po ji ltar yin te ma
NK046(mi)001:7771: yin zhing / gnyis pa ltar na dngos med dang
NK046(mi)001:7772: bral nas gzhan dngos por 'gyur ba'ang gang zhig yin
NK046(mi)001:7774: gzhan yang dngos med kyi gnas skabs ma btang na
NK046(mi)001:7775: dngos po med pa'i tshe dngos po yod pa srid
NK046(mi)001:7776: pa min na dngos po yod par nam zhig 'gyur
NK046(mi)001:7777: / gzhan yang dngos med kyi gnas skabs btang nas
NK046(mi)001:7778: 'gyur na dngos po skyes par ma gyur par dngos
NK046(mi)001:7779: po med pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur la /
NK046(mi)001:7780: dngos po med pa dang ma bral na yang dngos
NK046(mi)001:7781: po skyes nas yod pa'i skabs mi srid pas phan
NK046(mi)001:7782: tshun brten pa'i phyir mtha' gnyis ka mi srid pas
NK046(mi)001:7784: de bzhin du dngos po'ang 'gags nas dngos po med par 'gyur ba min te /
NK046(mi)001:7785: de'i tshe yang dngos po dang ma bral na rang
NK046(mi)001:7786: bzhin gcig nyid dngos po dang dngos med gnyis su
NK046(mi)001:7787: thal bar 'gyur ba las de mi srid pa'i phyir
NK046(mi)001:7788: dang / bral na dngos po'i tshe der bden par 'gal te /
NK046(mi)001:7789: gal te rang bzhin gyis yod na /
NK046(mi)001:7790: de ni med nyid mi 'gyur te //
NK046(mi)001:7793: de ltar 'gag pa yod min zhing dngos po skye ba'ang yod pa min pa de'i phyir /
NK046(mi)001:7794: 'gro ba 'di dag thams cad ni rtag tu ma
NK046(mi)001:7795: skyes pa ma 'gags pa gzod ma nas zhi ba
NK046(mi)001:7796: rang bzhin gyis mya ngan las 'das pa nyid yin
NK046(mi)001:7798: 'gro ba snang yang mi bden pa rmi lam lta
NK046(mi)001:7799: bu ste rnam par dpyad na snying po med pas
NK046(mi)001:7800: chu shing dang 'dra ba yin te /
NK046(mi)001:7801: ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po las /
NK046(mi)001:7802: ji ltar chu shing rlon pa'i sdong po la //
NK046(mi)001:7803: snying po 'dod phyir mi yis de gshegs kyang //
NK046(mi)001:7804: nang dang phyi rol kun la snying po med //
NK046(mi)001:7805: chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis //
NK046(mi)001:7807: des na mya ngan las 'das pa dang ma 'das
NK046(mi)001:7808: pa 'khor ba'ang de nyid du ni khyad par med
NK046(mi)001:7810: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do //
NK046(mi)001:7812: gsum pa shes rab kyis thob pa'i bya ba la gnyis te /
NK046(mi)001:7813: 'jig rten chos brgyad la blo mnyam par bya ba dang /
NK046(mi)001:7814: de ma rtogs pa la snying rje bskyed pa'o //
NK046(mi)001:7816: de ltar stong pa'i dngos po rnams la rnyed pa thob pa ci yod shor ba ci yod /
NK046(mi)001:7817: sems can gang gis bstod cing rim gro byas pa'am yongs su brnyas pa'ang ci zhig yod /
NK046(mi)001:7818: phan gnod gang las bde ba'am sdug bsngal yin /
NK046(mi)001:7819: snyan mi snyan mi dgar ci yod dgar ci yod /
NK046(mi)001:7820: de kho na nyid du btsal bar byas na yul can gang zhig sred cing yul gang la sred /
NK046(mi)001:7821: dpyad na gson pa'i 'jig rten 'di ma grub pas gang zhig 'dir ni 'chi 'gyur te /
NK046(mi)001:7822: tshe phyi ma 'byung 'gyur gang yin snga ma byung gyur gang /
NK046(mi)001:7823: gnyen dang bshes kyang gang zhig yin te /
NK046(mi)001:7824: de dag thams cad nam mkha' dang 'dra bar cir
NK046(mi)001:7825: yang ma grub par zhi ba'i lha bdag dang 'dra
NK046(mi)001:7826: bar gnas lugs la dpyod pa rnams kyis gzung bar
NK046(mi)001:7832: dang po tshe 'dir tshegs kyis 'tsho ba ni /
NK046(mi)001:7833: bdag nyid bde bar 'dod pa rnams ni 'thad pa
NK046(mi)001:7834: dang phan gdags par spro ba'i rgyu dag gis yid
NK046(mi)001:7835: rab tu 'khrugs pa dang dga' bar byed cing /
NK046(mi)001:7836: bde ba ma thob pas mya ngan dang thob pa'i
NK046(mi)001:7837: don du rang gi sgo gsum gyis 'bad rtsol dang
NK046(mi)001:7839: bdag gzhan phan tshun lus gcod pa dang 'bigs pa
NK046(mi)001:7840: dang sdig pa mang po dag gis tshegs chen pos
NK046(mi)001:7842: gnyis pa phyi mar sdug bsngal ba ni /
NK046(mi)001:7843: bde 'gror yang dang yang du 'ongs nas bde ba
NK046(mi)001:7844: mang po spyod par byas nas kyang shi nas ngan
NK046(mi)001:7845: song gi sdug bsngal yun ring zhing mi bzad pa
NK046(mi)001:7846: rnams su ltung bar snang ngo /
NK046(mi)001:7847: gsum pa srid pa spyi'i nyes pa la gsum las /
NK046(mi)001:7848: dang po thar pa dang 'gal ba ni /
NK046(mi)001:7849: srid pa na ni sdug bsngal gyi g.yang sa mang
NK046(mi)001:7850: zhing der ni thar pa'i thabs de kho na nyid
NK046(mi)001:7851: rtogs pa min par gzugs sogs bden par 'dzin pa
NK046(mi)001:7852: 'di 'dra dang ldan pa'i skabs der yang stong nyid
NK046(mi)001:7853: rtogs pa dang dngos por 'dzin pa phan tshun 'gal
NK046(mi)001:7854: bas na / srid pa na de kho na nyid rtogs pa 'di 'dra med pas /
NK046(mi)001:7855: der yang dpe med mi bzad pa'i sdug bsngal rgya mtsho mtha' las 'das pa myong bar 'gyur ro //
NK046(mi)001:7856: gnyis pa 'gal ba de bzlog dka' ba ni /
NK046(mi)001:7857: der ni de ltar stong nyid ma rtogs pas dge
NK046(mi)001:7858: ba sgrub pa'i stobs chung zhing der ni dge ba'i
NK046(mi)001:7859: rten dal 'byor gyi tshe yang thung ba nyid yin
NK046(mi)001:7860: la / tshe gnas dus der yang gson pa dang
NK046(mi)001:7861: nad med kyi thabs sogs sgrub par byed pa dang
NK046(mi)001:7862: ngal ba dang gnyid dang gzhan gyis 'tshe ba dang
NK046(mi)001:7863: la / / de bzhin du byis pa dang 'grogs
NK046(mi)001:7864: pa la sogs pa don med kyi bya ba rnams
NK046(mi)001:7865: kyis tshe 'di don med du myur du 'da' zhing
NK046(mi)001:7866: la / / / snang ba bden med du rnam
NK046(mi)001:7867: par dpyod pa shin tu rnyed par dka' bas na
NK046(mi)001:7868: la / / / / der yang dngos por zhen
NK046(mi)001:7869: pa'i rnam g.yeng thog med nas goms pa de bzlog
NK046(mi)001:7870: pa'i thabs ni ga la yod /
NK046(mi)001:7871: rang la mthun rkyen ma tshang bar ma zad kyi gzhan gyis 'gal rkyen byed pa yang yod de /
NK046(mi)001:7872: der yang ngan song chen por ni ltung phyir bdud
NK046(mi)001:7873: ni brtson par byed cing de ni bdud kyis bstan
NK046(mi)001:7874: pa log pa'i lam mang zhing /
NK046(mi)001:7875: yang dag pa'i lam la the tshom za ba las kyang brgal bar dka' ste /
NK046(mi)001:7876: de dag gi stobs kyis slar yang dal ba rnyed
NK046(mi)001:7877: dka' zhing sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed pa shin tu
NK046(mi)001:7878: dka' la nyon mongs chu bo spang dka' ste /
NK046(mi)001:7879: e ma 'khor ba 'di rnams sdug bsngal brgyud mar myong bar 'gyur ro zhes brtse bas smras pa'o //
NK046(mi)001:7880: gsum pa phyin ci log gi dbang gis sdug bsngal bde bar 'dzin pa ni /
NK046(mi)001:7881: de ltar shin tu sdug bsngal bar gnas kyang rang
NK046(mi)001:7882: sdug bsngal dang de'i rgyu la zhugs pa ma mthong
NK046(mi)001:7883: ba gang yin pa'i sems can sdug bsngal gyi chu
NK046(mi)001:7884: bor gnas pa 'di dag kyi hud mya ngan bya
NK046(mi)001:7885: bar 'os te / dper na 'ga' zhig yang yang
NK046(mi)001:7886: khrus byas shing yang yang mer 'jug pa'i stobs kyis
NK046(mi)001:7887: de ltar shin tu sdug bsngal bar gnas kyang /
NK046(mi)001:7888: de la bdag nyid bde bar rlom pa bzhin du
NK046(mi)001:7889: sdug bsngal la bde bar rlom pa yin pas so
NK046(mi)001:7890: // de ltar shin tu sdug bsngal yang rga ba
NK046(mi)001:7891: dang 'chi ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal med pa
NK046(mi)001:7892: bzhin du sdug bsngal rgyu dang bcas pa la spyod
NK046(mi)001:7893: pas gnas pa rnams la dang po nyid du 'chi
NK046(mi)001:7894: bdag gis gsod par byas nas /
NK046(mi)001:7895: de nas ngan song gsum du ltung ba'i sdug bsngal
NK046(mi)001:7896: mi bzad pa 'ong bas 'di dag sdug bsngal rgyu
NK046(mi)001:7901: de ltar sdug bsngal gyi mes gdungs ba rnams la
NK046(mi)001:7902: bsod nams kyi sprin las legs par byung ba'i rang
NK046(mi)001:7903: gi bde ba'i tshogs kyi char gyis de dag gi
NK046(mi)001:7904: sdug bsngal de zhi bar byed par nam zhig 'gyur
NK046(mi)001:7905: / gnyis pa phan pa'i rgyur smon pa ni /
NK046(mi)001:7906: nam zhig chos thams cad dmigs pa med par rtogs
NK046(mi)001:7907: pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa'i tshul gyis gus pas
NK046(mi)001:7908: thabs bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags te rang gi tshogs
NK046(mi)001:7909: gnyis rdzogs nas gzhan dmigs pas phung bar 'gyur ba
NK046(mi)001:7910: rnams la stong pa nyid ni ston par 'gyur zhig
NK046(mi)001:7911: gu snyam du dgongs pas so //
NK046(mi)001:7912: le'u dgu pa bshad zin to //
NK046(mi)001:7914: // gsum pa thams cad mthar phyin pa'i don la gnyis te /
NK046(mi)001:7916: bka' drin dran pa'i phyag bya ba'o //
NK046(mi)001:7919: rtsom pa po rang gi don dang /
NK046(mi)001:7920: thun mong bstan pa'i don du bsngo ba'o //
NK046(mi)001:7922: 'jig rten pa rnams kyi phan bde 'grub pa'i dang /
NK046(mi)001:7923: 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams kyi bzhed don 'grub pa'i rgyur bsngo ba'o //
NK046(mi)001:7926: khyad par du bstan pa la zhugs pa'i don du bsngo ba'o //
NK046(mi)001:7930: thun mong gi don du bsngo ba'o //
NK046(mi)001:7932: dang po phan pa'i don du bsngo ba ni //
NK046(mi)001:7933: bdag gis byang chub spyod pa la //
NK046(mi)001:7934: 'jug pa rnam par brtsams pa yi //
NK046(mi)001:7935: dge ba gang des 'gro ba kun //
NK046(mi)001:7936: byang chub spyod la 'jug par shog /
NK046(mi)001:7938: gnyis pa bde ba'i don du bsngo ba ni /
NK046(mi)001:7939: phyogs rnams kun na lus dang sems sdug bsngal ba'i
NK046(mi)001:7940: nad pa ji snyed yod pa rnams de dag bdag
NK046(mi)001:7941: gi bsod nams kyis bde dga' rgya mtsho thob par
NK046(mi)001:7942: shog / de dag sangs rgyas kyi bde ba ma
NK046(mi)001:7943: thob kyi bar du nam yang bde ba las nyams
NK046(mi)001:7947: brtan pa brtse dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa yis //
NK046(mi)001:7948: sbyin pa'i bde ba byed pa gang yin pa //
NK046(mi)001:7949: de la khams gsum nye bar spyod rnams kyis //
NK046(mi)001:7950: bde ba de yi char yang mi phod do //
NK046(mi)001:7953: bde ba rgyun mi chad par shog /
NK046(mi)001:7960: yi dwags kyis don du bsngo ba'o //
NK046(mi)001:7962: sdug bsngal rang zhi ba dang /
NK046(mi)001:7963: gzhan gyi mthus zhi bar smon pa'o //
NK046(mi)001:7964: dang po la bstan bshad gnyis kyi /
NK046(mi)001:7966: 'jig rten khams na dmyal ba dag /
NK046(mi)001:7967: gang dag ji snyed yod pa rnams //
NK046(mi)001:7968: de dag tu ni lus can rnams //
NK046(mi)001:7969: bde can bde bas dga' bar shog /
NK046(mi)001:7979: pad+ma ltar cher gas pa ste /
NK046(mi)001:7980: grang bas nyam thag pa'i dmyal ba brgyad po de dag gis dro ba thob par shog /
NK046(mi)001:7981: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs gnyis kyi sprin chen las byung ba'i chu bo mtha' yas kyis /
NK046(mi)001:7989: mnar med pa ste tsha bas nyam thag pa'i dmyal ba brgyad po de dag bsil bar shog /
NK046(mi)001:7990: ral gri lo ma'i nags tshal yang /
NK046(mi)001:7991: de la dga' tshal sdug gur shog /
NK046(mi)001:7992: shal ma li yi sdong po dag /
NK046(mi)001:7993: dpag bsam shing du 'khrungs par shog /
NK046(mi)001:7994: mthing ril ngur pa dag dang ngang pa dang /
NK046(mi)001:7995: bzhad sogs skad snyan 'byin pas mdzes gyur cing /
NK046(mi)001:7996: pad+ma dri bsung che ldan mtsho dag gis /
NK046(mi)001:7997: dmyal ba'i sa phyogs dag ni nyams dgar shog /
NK046(mi)001:7998: sol phung de yang rin chen phung por gyur /
NK046(mi)001:7999: lcags bsregs kyi sa gzhi shel gyi sa gzhi bstar bar shog /
NK046(mi)001:8000: bsdus 'joms ri bo rnams kyang mchod pa yi gzhal
NK046(mi)001:8001: med khang du gyur te de dag bde gshegs rnams
NK046(mi)001:8003: mdag ma me dang rdo bsregs pa dang mtshon gyi char pa dag /
NK046(mi)001:8004: deng nas bzung ste me tog char par gyur /
NK046(mi)001:8005: phan tshun gcig la gcig mtshon gyis brdeg pa de yang ni /
NK046(mi)001:8006: deng nas rtsed mo rtse ba'i phyir me tog 'phen par shog /
NK046(mi)001:8007: chu bo rab med me dang 'dra ba'i nang du
NK046(mi)001:8008: bying ba dag sha kun tshig nas zhig par gyur
NK046(mi)001:8009: te rus gong me tog kun+da'i mdog ltar dkar por
NK046(mi)001:8010: gyur pa rnams / bdag gi dge ba'i stobs kyis lha yi lus thob nas /
NK046(mi)001:8011: lha mo rnams dang lhan cig dal gyis 'bab par gnas par shog /
NK046(mi)001:8013: ci'i phyir 'dir ni gshin rje'i mi dang khwa dang bya rgod mi bzad rnams skrag byed /
NK046(mi)001:8014: kun nas mun bsal bde ba dang dga' ba bskyed
NK046(mi)001:8015: pa'i mthu bzang 'di ko su yi mthu snyam ste
NK046(mi)001:8016: / gyen du bltas pas nam mkha'i dkyil na byang
NK046(mi)001:8017: chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje gzi brjid 'bar
NK046(mi)001:8018: ba bzhugs pa mthong nas rab tu dga' zhing dang
NK046(mi)001:8019: ba'i shugs kyis sdig dang bral nas phyag na rdo
NK046(mi)001:8020: rje de dang lhan cig 'grogs par shog /
NK046(mi)001:8021: me tog char pa spos chu dang 'dres pa 'bab
NK046(mi)001:8022: pa yis dmyal ba'i me mdag chil chil gsod pa
NK046(mi)001:8023: mthong gyur nas / glo bur bde bas tshim pa
NK046(mi)001:8024: 'di ci las gyur bsams pa dang sems dmyal rnams
NK046(mi)001:8025: kyis de ltar mdzad pa po phyag na pad+ma bsnams
NK046(mi)001:8026: pa spyan ras gzigs mthong bar shog /
NK046(mi)001:8027: 'ga' zhig gis 'jam dbyangs mthong nas gzhan rnams la grogs dag ces bos te /
NK046(mi)001:8028: 'jigs pa bor la rings par tshur shog 'u bu'i
NK046(mi)001:8029: thad du ni gang gi mthu yis sdug bsngal thams
NK046(mi)001:8030: cad dang bral zhing dga' ba'i shugs phyin la 'gro
NK046(mi)001:8031: ba kun skyob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dmyal ba'i
NK046(mi)001:8032: sdug bsngal sel nus kyi 'od zer dang sel bar
NK046(mi)001:8033: byed pa'i brtse ba skyes par gyur pa gzhon nu
NK046(mi)001:8034: zur phud can 'bar ba 'jam dbyangs kyis 'jigs pa
NK046(mi)001:8036: gzhan du bros te ci zhig phyin te phyin mi dgos kyi grogs po khyed rnams kyis /
NK046(mi)001:8037: lha brgya'i cod pan dag gis zhabs kyi pad+ma la mchod cing /
NK046(mi)001:8038: thugs rjes brlan pa'i spyan dang ldan pa'i dbu la
NK046(mi)001:8039: me tog du ma'i tshogs kyi char 'bab pa'i 'jam
NK046(mi)001:8040: dbyangs khang pa brtsegs pa yid du 'ong ba lha
NK046(mi)001:8041: mo stong phrag bstod dbyangs sgrogs pa'i nang na bzhugs
NK046(mi)001:8042: pa 'di ltos zhes grogs rnams la de bstan te
NK046(mi)001:8043: / thams cad kyis 'jam dbyangs de 'dra mthong nas
NK046(mi)001:8044: da ni sems dmyal dga' bas ku co 'don par
NK046(mi)001:8045: / shog / de ltar bdag gi dge rtsas kun
NK046(mi)001:8046: tu bzang po la sogs pa ste byams pa dang
NK046(mi)001:8047: sa'i snying po dang nam mkha'i snying po dang byang
NK046(mi)001:8048: chub sems dpa' sgrib pa rnam sel la sogs pa
NK046(mi)001:8049: rnams rang rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu las byung
NK046(mi)001:8050: ba'i sprin bde ba ste yid du 'ong ba dang
NK046(mi)001:8051: bsil zhing dri zhim dang ldan char pa 'bebs mthong
NK046(mi)001:8052: / shog / nas / sems can dmyal ba de dag mngon par dgag gyur cig /
NK046(mi)001:8054: dud 'gro rnams ni gcig la gcig za ba la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa dang bral bar gyur cig /
NK046(mi)001:8056: sgra mi snyan pa'i mi bzhin du /
NK046(mi)001:8057: zas skom mi rnyed pa'i sdug bsngal med par /
NK046(mi)001:8058: yi dwags rnams ni bde bar 'gyur /
NK046(mi)001:8059: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang gi /
NK046(mi)001:8061: yi dwags rnams ni tshim byas shing /
NK046(mi)001:8062: khrus byas rtag tu bsil bar shog /
NK046(mi)001:8064: long ba rnams kyis gzugs mthong zhing /
NK046(mi)001:8065: 'on pas rtag tu sgra thos shog /
NK046(mi)001:8066: lha mo sgyu 'phrul ji bzhin du /
NK046(mi)001:8067: sbrum ma'ang gnod med btsa' bar shog /
NK046(mi)001:8068: gcer bu rnams kyis gos dag dang /
NK046(mi)001:8069: bkres pa rnams kyis zas dag dang /
NK046(mi)001:8070: skom pa rnams kyis chu dag dang /
NK046(mi)001:8071: btung ba zhim po thob par shog /
NK046(mi)001:8072: bkren pa rnams kyis nor thob shog /
NK046(mi)001:8073: mya ngan nyam thag dga' thob shog /
NK046(mi)001:8074: yi chad rnams kyang yid sos shing /
NK046(mi)001:8075: sdug bsngal dang yid mi bdes mi bardzi ba'i brtan pa phun sum tshogs par shog /
NK046(mi)001:8076: sems can nad pa ji snyed pa /
NK046(mi)001:8077: myur du nad las thar bar gyur /
NK046(mi)001:8078: 'gro ba'i nad rnams ma lus pa /
NK046(mi)001:8079: rtag tu 'byung ba med par shog /
NK046(mi)001:8080: skrag pa rnams ni 'jigs med shog /
NK046(mi)001:8081: bcings pa rnams kyang grol bar gyur /
NK046(mi)001:8082: mthu med rnams ni mthu ldan zhing /
NK046(mi)001:8083: phan tshun sems ni mnyen pa ste phan sems dang ldan par gyur cig /
NK046(mi)001:8084: 'gron po dag ni thams cad la /
NK046(mi)001:8085: phyogs rnams thams cad bde bar shog /
NK046(mi)001:8086: gang gi don du 'gro byed pa /
NK046(mi)001:8087: de 'bad mi dgos par 'grub par shog /
NK046(mi)001:8088: gru dang gru chen zhugs pa dag /
NK046(mi)001:8089: yid la bsam pa 'grub gyur te /
NK046(mi)001:8090: chu yi ngogs su bder phyin nas /
NK046(mi)001:8091: gnyen dang lhan cig dga' bar shog /
NK046(mi)001:8092: mya ngan lam gol 'khyams pa dag /
NK046(mi)001:8093: mgron po dag dang phrad gyur te /
NK046(mi)001:8094: chom rkun stag sogs 'jigs med par /
NK046(mi)001:8095: mi ngal bde blag 'dong bar shog /
NK046(mi)001:8096: 'brog dgon la sogs pa lam med cing nyam nga ba /
NK046(mi)001:8097: byis pa dang rgan po mgon med pa gnyid log
NK046(mi)001:8098: myos shing rab myos rnams lha dag gis srung bar
NK046(mi)001:8099: byed par shog / mi dal ba brgyad po kun
NK046(mi)001:8100: las thar ba dang dad dang shes rab brtser ldan
NK046(mi)001:8101: byed par shog / zhing / kha na ma tho
NK046(mi)001:8102: ba med pa'i zas dang spyod pa phun sum tshogs
NK046(mi)001:8103: nas rtag tu tshe rabs dran gyur cig /
NK046(mi)001:8104: 'jig rten nam sems can thams cad nam mkha' mdzod bzhin du longs spyod chad pa med par shog /
NK046(mi)001:8105: de dag phan tshun rtsod pa med cing 'tshe ba med par rang dbang du ni spyod par shog /
NK046(mi)001:8106: sems can gzi brjid chung ngu gang /
NK046(mi)001:8107: de dag gzi brjid chen por shog /
NK046(mi)001:8108: dka' thub can gang gzugs ngan pa //
NK046(mi)001:8109: gzugs bzang phun sum tshogs gyur cig /
NK046(mi)001:8110: 'jig rten bud med ji snyed pa /
NK046(mi)001:8111: de dag skyes pa nyid gyur cig /
NK046(mi)001:8112: ma rabs rnams ni mtho thob cing /
NK046(mi)001:8113: nga rgyal dag kyang bcom par shog /
NK046(mi)001:8118: bdag gis bsod nams 'di yin ni /
NK046(mi)001:8119: sems can thams cad ma lus pa /
NK046(mi)001:8120: sdig pa thams cad spangs nas ni /
NK046(mi)001:8121: rtag tu dge ba byed par shog /
NK046(mi)001:8122: ces spyir phan pa tsam dang /
NK046(mi)001:8123: khyad par du bsam pa byang chub sems dang mi
NK046(mi)001:8124: 'bral zhing sbyor ba byang chub spyod pa la gzhol
NK046(mi)001:8125: bar shog / mthun rkyen sangs rgyas rnams kyis yongs bzung zhing /
NK046(mi)001:8126: 'gal rkyen bdud kyi las kyang spangs bar shog /
NK046(mi)001:8128: dang po 'dod pa 'grub par bsngo ba ni /
NK046(mi)001:8129: sems can de dag thams cad ni /
NK046(mi)001:8130: tshe yang dpag med ring bar shog /
NK046(mi)001:8132: 'chi ba'i sgra yang grags ma gyur /
NK046(mi)001:8133: dpag bsam shing gi skyed mos tshal /
NK046(mi)001:8134: sangs rgyas dang ni sangs rgyas sras /
NK046(mi)001:8135: chos snyan sgrogs pas gang ba yis /
NK046(mi)001:8136: phyogs rnams thams cad gang bar shog /
NK046(mi)001:8137: thams cad du yang sa gzhi dag /
NK046(mi)001:8138: gseg ma la sogs med pa dang /
NK046(mi)001:8140: rang bzhin 'jam por gnas gyur cig /
NK046(mi)001:8141: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yod dgur te thams cad du yang /
NK046(mi)001:8142: byang chub sems dpa' mang po dag /
NK046(mi)001:8143: rang rang gi legs pa ste rdzu 'phrul la sogs
NK046(mi)001:8144: pas sa steng dag brgyan par mdzad pas bzhugs gyur
NK046(mi)001:8145: cig / lus can kun gyis bya dang ni shing dang 'od zer la sogs pa thams cad dang /
NK046(mi)001:8146: nam mkha' las kyang chos kyi sgra /
NK046(mi)001:8147: rgyun mi 'chad par thos par shog /
NK046(mi)001:8148: de dag rtag tu sangs rgyas dang /
NK046(mi)001:8149: sangs rgyas sras dang phrad gyur cig /
NK046(mi)001:8150: phrad nas kyang mchod pa'i sprin ni mtha' yas pas 'gro ba'i bla ma sangs rgyas mchod par shog /
NK046(mi)001:8151: lha yang dus su char 'bebs shing /
NK046(mi)001:8152: lo tog phun sum tshogs par shog /
NK046(mi)001:8153: rgyal po chos bzhin byed gyur cig /
NK046(mi)001:8154: 'jig rten dag kyang dar bar shog /
NK046(mi)001:8155: sman rnams mthu dang ldan pa dang /
NK046(mi)001:8156: nad gdon dang sdig pa la sogs pa zhi bar
NK046(mi)001:8157: byed pa'i gsang sngags kyi bzlas brjod byas pa'i dgos
NK046(mi)001:8158: pa rnams ji ltar gsungs pa ltar 'grub par shog
NK046(mi)001:8159: / mkha' 'gro dang srin po la sogs pa gdug
NK046(mi)001:8160: pa can thams cad kyang snying rje'i sems dang ldan
NK046(mi)001:8161: / par gyur cig / gnyis pa mi 'dod pa dang 'bral bar smon pa ni /
NK046(mi)001:8162: sems can 'ga' yang sdug ma gyur /
NK046(mi)001:8163: 'jigs dang gzhan gyis brnyas par mi 'gyur zhing /
NK046(mi)001:8164: 'ga' yang yid mi bde ma gyur /
NK046(mi)001:8165: gnyis pa bstan pa la zhugs pa'i don du bsngo ba la gnyis las /
NK046(mi)001:8166: dang po spyir bsngo ba ni /
NK046(mi)001:8167: gtsug lag ni chos yin la de yod pa'i khang pa'am /
NK046(mi)001:8168: dge 'dun gyi khang pa ste de rnams su dge
NK046(mi)001:8169: 'dun rnams klog pa dang kha ton la sogs pa
NK046(mi)001:8170: chos spyod kyi bya ba rgyas shing legs par gnas
NK046(mi)001:8171: par shog / rtag tu dge 'dun rnams mthun pa dang /
NK046(mi)001:8172: dge 'dun gyi don yang ji ltar dgongs pa ltar 'grub par shog /
NK046(mi)001:8173: gnyis pa so so'i don du bsngo ba ni /
NK046(mi)001:8174: thar pa'i lam la bslab par 'dod pa'i dge slong dag dben pa dag kyang thob par shog /
NK046(mi)001:8175: der yang g.yeng ba thams cad spangs nas ni sems ni las su rung ba ste /
NK046(mi)001:8176: dge ba ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sbyar du rung bas dge ba bsgom par gyur cig /
NK046(mi)001:8177: dge slong ma rnams rnyed ldan zhing phan tshun 'thab pa dang gzhan gyis gnod pa spang bar shog /
NK046(mi)001:8178: de bzhin du rab tu byung ba kun tshul khrims nyams pa med par gyur cig /
NK046(mi)001:8179: gal te tshul khrims 'chal na des yid byung ste 'gyod nas rtag tu sdig pa zad byed shog /
NK046(mi)001:8180: zad pa'i stobs kyis phyi mar bde 'gro dag kyang thob gyur nas /
NK046(mi)001:8181: de yang brtul zhugs mi nyams shog /
NK046(mi)001:8182: mkhas pa rnams ni bkur ba dang /
NK046(mi)001:8183: bsod nams dag kyang rnyed par shog /
NK046(mi)001:8184: rgyud ni nga rgyal la sogs pas yongs su dag pa dang /
NK046(mi)001:8185: phyogs rnams kun tu grags par shog /
NK046(mi)001:8186: sems can de dag thams cad ngan song gi sdug
NK046(mi)001:8187: bsngal mi myong zhing sgo gsum gyi dka' ba spyod
NK046(mi)001:8188: pa med par yang gnas skabs su lha bas lhag
NK046(mi)001:8189: pa'i lus kyis ni de dag mthar thug sangs rgyas
NK046(mi)001:8190: myur 'grub shog / sems can kun gyis lan mang du /
NK046(mi)001:8191: sangs rgyas thams cad mchod byed cing /
NK046(mi)001:8192: sangs rgyas bde ba bsam yas kyis /
NK046(mi)001:8193: rtag tu bde dang ldan gyur cig /
NK046(mi)001:8195: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ni 'gro don ji ltar thugs la dgongs pa ltar 'grub par shog /
NK046(mi)001:8196: mgon po sangs rgyas rnams kyis dgongs pa ltar sems can rnams la'ang de 'byor shog /
NK046(mi)001:8197: de bzhin rang sangs rgyas rnams dang nyan thos rnams
NK046(mi)001:8198: kyang myang 'das kyi bde ba dang ldan par gyur
NK046(mi)001:8200: bdag kyang 'jam dbyangs bka' drin gyis //
NK046(mi)001:8201: sa rab tu dga' ba thob bar du /
NK046(mi)001:8202: rtag tu tshe rabs dran pa dang /
NK046(mi)001:8203: rab tu byung ba thob par shog /
NK046(mi)001:8204: 'di ni gdul bya rnams 'di ltar smon lam gdab
NK046(mi)001:8205: pa'i phyir du gsungs kyi 'dis slob dpon so skye
NK046(mi)001:8207: dper na sdig pa med pas sdig bshags gsungs pa bzhin no //
NK046(mi)001:8208: 'grel pa dag las kyang 'phags pa zhi ba lha zhes gsungs pa dang /
NK046(mi)001:8209: mchog gi dngos grub brnyes pa yin no //
NK046(mi)001:8211: bdag ni kha zas gyi na ste ngan ngon tsam
NK046(mi)001:8212: gyis kyang lus nyams dang ldan zhing 'tsho bar shog
NK046(mi)001:8213: / tshe rabs kun tu dben gnas pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa thob gyur cig /
NK046(mi)001:8215: cung zad dri bar 'dod na yang /
NK046(mi)001:8216: mgon po 'jams dbyangs de nyid ni /
NK046(mi)001:8217: gegs med par yang mthong bar shog /
NK046(mi)001:8218: phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i /
NK046(mi)001:8219: sems can kun don sgrub pa'i phyir /
NK046(mi)001:8220: ji ltar 'jam dbyangs spyod mdzad pa /
NK046(mi)001:8221: bdag gi spyod pa'ang de 'drar shog /
NK046(mi)001:8222: ji srid nam mkha' gnas pa dang /
NK046(mi)001:8223: 'gro ba ji srid gnas gyur pa /
NK046(mi)001:8224: de srid bdag ni gnas gyur nas /
NK046(mi)001:8225: 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel bar shog /
NK046(mi)001:8226: 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal gang ci'ang rung /
NK046(mi)001:8227: de kun bdag la smin gyur cig /
NK046(mi)001:8228: byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyi stobs kyis 'gro ba thams cad bde ba la spyod par shog /
NK046(mi)001:8230: 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal gyi nad sel ba'i sman gcig pu /
NK046(mi)001:8231: gnas skabs dang mthar thug gi bde ba thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas /
NK046(mi)001:8232: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa rnyed pa dang bkur sti
NK046(mi)001:8233: dang bcas te yun ring du gnas par gyur cig
NK046(mi)001:8235: gang gi drin gyis bdag la bstan bcos 'di byed
NK046(mi)001:8236: pa'i dge blo 'byung ba'i 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag
NK046(mi)001:8237: 'tshal lo // gang gi drin gyis bdag gi dge
NK046(mi)001:8238: ba'i phyogs dar zhing rgyas par mdzad pa'i dge ba'i
NK046(mi)001:8239: bshes gnyen de la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK046(mi)001:8240: zhes bka' drin dran pa'i sgo nas phyag 'tshal ba'o //
NK046(mi)001:8241: le'u bcu pa bshad zin to //
NK046(mi)001:8243: // dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad gshegs pa'i lam //
NK046(mi)001:8244: rgyal sras spyod pa pha rol phyin pa drug /
NK046(mi)001:8245: legs ston gzhung 'di bshad pa'i dge ba yis //
NK046(mi)001:8246: 'gro kun byang chub spyod la 'jug par shog /
NK046(mi)001:8247: ngan song rnams ni mi bzad sdug bsngal las //
NK046(mi)001:8248: rnam par grol zhing thar pa'i lam rnyed nas //
NK046(mi)001:8249: tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i dpal ldan pa'i //
NK046(mi)001:8250: mya ngan 'das pa'i grong du myur 'jug shog /
NK046(mi)001:8251: bde 'gro bde ba'i dpal las mi nyams shing //
NK046(mi)001:8252: 'khor ba'i bde ba snying po med rtogs nas //
NK046(mi)001:8253: gzung 'dzin mtshan ma'i spros pa rab zhi ba'i //
NK046(mi)001:8254: zag med bde ba'i dpal la spyod par shog /
NK046(mi)001:8255: gang gi stobs kyis sdug bsngal kun 'byung gi //
NK046(mi)001:8256: mun pa kun sel phan bde pad+mo'i tshal //
NK046(mi)001:8257: rnam par rgyas byed thub bstan 'od brgya can //
NK046(mi)001:8258: 'jig rten khams 'dir yun ring gnas gyur cig /
NK046(mi)001:8259: bslab gsum yon tan rin chen mdzod 'dzin cing //
NK046(mi)001:8260: mkhyen brtse thabs mkhas phun sum tshogs pa yis //
NK046(mi)001:8261: bde gshegs bstan dang 'gro kun legs skyong ba'i //
NK046(mi)001:8262: bshes gnyen mchog rnams sku tshe brtan gyur cig /
NK046(mi)001:8263: bde gshegs bstan la rab zhugs skyes bu rnams //
NK046(mi)001:8264: snyom las 'du 'dzi'i 'ching ba las grol te //
NK046(mi)001:8265: tshul gnas thos bsam sgom pa'i sbyor ba yis //
NK046(mi)001:8266: rtag tu sgo gsum don yod spyod par shog /
NK046(mi)001:8267: mkha' las dus su lha yis char 'bebs shing //
NK046(mi)001:8268: sa chen 'bru smin rtsi shing bzang pos brgyan //
NK046(mi)001:8269: skye bo rab bde phan tshun byams ldan zhing //
NK046(mi)001:8270: rtag tu dge ba bcu la spyod par shog /
NK046(mi)001:8271: bdag kyang deng nas byang chub ma thob bar //
NK046(mi)001:8272: 'khor ba'i bde la nam yang mi chags shing //
NK046(mi)001:8273: rang nyid thar pa'ang don du mi gnyer bar //
NK046(mi)001:8274: 'gro ba'i don la rtag tu brtson par shog /
NK046(mi)001:8275: gang dag bdag la chags dang sdang ba dang //
NK046(mi)001:8276: bstod dang smod dang phan dang gnod byed kyang //
NK046(mi)001:8277: gang gis bdag mthong thos dang dran pa dang //
NK046(mi)001:8278: thams cad myur du byang chub mchog thob shog /
NK046(mi)001:8279: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa'i 'grel
NK046(mi)001:8280: pa legs par bshad pa'i rgya mtsho zhes bya ba
NK046(mi)001:8281: / lung rigs smra ba thogs med kyis dpal e'i gtsug lag khang du sbyar ba'o //
NK046(mi)001:8282: na mo bud+d+ha bo d+hi sa t+w+aa ya /
NK046(mi)001:8283: rab 'byams rgya mtsho ji snyed zhing gi khyon //
NK046(mi)001:8284: thub dbang nyi ma 'bar ba'i snang bas khyab //
NK046(mi)001:8285: 'khor gyi dbus su mi 'jigs seng ge'i sgras //
NK046(mi)001:8286: dus gsum kun tu dam chos sgo 'phar dbye /
NK046(mi)001:8288: 1 / zab zhi mtha' brgyad spros bral me long du //
NK046(mi)001:8289: rten cing 'brel 'byung 'char ba'i ngang tshul las //
NK046(mi)001:8290: shes dang shes bya tha dad ma dmigs pa'i //
NK046(mi)001:8291: shes rab 'khor lo'i 'phrul chen ci yang g.yo /
NK046(mi)001:8293: 2 / ngo mtshar rnam thar bla bre gsar pa yis //
NK046(mi)001:8294: srid zhi mtha' dag khebs pa'i rmad byung dang //
NK046(mi)001:8295: lhan cig blo gros mi zad zhi ba lha //
NK046(mi)001:8296: grags snyan rgyal sras bye ba'i dbus na mtho /
NK046(mi)001:8298: 3 / mgon des sde snod mdzod khang brtol ba'i dbyig /
NK046(mi)001:8299: 'chos skyob gnyis ldan yid bzhin dbang gi rgyal //
NK046(mi)001:8300: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul zab mo la //
NK046(mi)001:8301: 'jug tshul theg chen gzhung lam mchog 'di byung /
NK046(mi)001:8303: 4 / 'phags bod mkhas dbang du mar 'chad nyan sgor //
NK046(mi)001:8304: 'grel gzhung rin chen thang mar brdal ba las //
NK046(mi)001:8305: nyung ngu'i tshig gis rgya che'i don gsal ba //
NK046(mi)001:8306: byang sems thogs med zhabs kyis stsal 'di yin /
NK046(mi)001:8308: 5 / nyi ma zla ba ltar grags gzhung bzang 'dir //
NK046(mi)001:8309: rnam mkhyen 'jug ngogs tshang la ma nor ba //
NK046(mi)001:8310: smon 'jug byang sems kyis drangs phar phyin drug /
NK046(mi)001:8311: spyod pa yongs bsngo bcas pa'i don du 'dus /
NK046(mi)001:8313: 6 / de phyir mchog gi zhal lung nyi zer gyis //
NK046(mi)001:8314: bran pa'i sa skyong pad+mo 'dab yangs ma //
NK046(mi)001:8315: chos dbyings bzang mo'i thugs bskyed ri dbang ltar //
NK046(mi)001:8316: mngon mtho'i dpal gyis chos sbyin phyi mor bskrun /
NK046(mi)001:8318: 7 / gcig las du mar 'char ba'i ngo mtshar can //
NK046(mi)001:8319: bstan 'gro spyi la sman pa'i btsas gcig pu //
NK046(mi)001:8320: sde dge mi yi tshangs dbang rim byon gyi //
NK046(mi)001:8321: phyag srol slar yang mi nub dar bar mdzad /
NK046(mi)001:8323: 8 / rnam dkar bdag po'i rkyen las byung ba dang //
NK046(mi)001:8324: rang gzhan 'gro ba'i dge rtsa gang mchis rnams //
NK046(mi)001:8325: byang chub chen por 'bab pa'i yongs bsngo mchog /
NK046(mi)001:8326: sras bcas rgyal ba'i ji bzhin 'grub gyur cig 9 /
NK046(mi)001:8327: ces pa'i spar byang smon tshig dang bcas pa 'di ni /
NK046(mi)001:8328: sa skyong mi'i dbang mo mchog gi bka' stsal ltar /
NK046(mi)001:8329: rgyal sras 'jam dbyangs chos kyi nyi ma blo gros
NK046(mi)001:8330: rgyas pa'i sdes smras pa sarba d+aa ka l+y+aa nam
